name: Cauliflower Fritters
author: BETTYCOOK
summary: These cauliflower fritters are easy to make and a different way to have cauliflower. So delicious and tasty. I've made these a number of times for my family and friends.
ingredients: 1 (.7 ounce) package dry Italian-style salad dressing mix
½ cup olive oil for frying, or as needed
directions: Process cauliflower in a food processor finely minced; transfer to a large bowl
Stir flour, eggs, baking powder, and Italian dressing mix into cauliflower
Heat enough olive oil to cover the bottom of a frying pan over medium heat
Drop heaping tablespoons of cauliflower mixture into the hot oil; fry until golden brown, about 3 minutes per side
